short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Skool experience with behind the scenes information about communities and AI capabilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock Exclusive Insights on Skool Communities

Community Copilot is the essential tool for Skool users who want to delve deeper into community statistics and trends without needing to join them.

Get started effortlessly ⏰ In just a few clicks, you can:

📊 View comprehensive community details, including member count, post activity, and more.
💰 Calculate estimated revenue based on membership data.
🔍 Analyze community features such as courses, modules, and plugin usage.
📈 Detailed analytics on community growth and member trends.

Future updates will empower you with:

🤖 AI-powered responses to community posts.
📝 AI-generated posts and comments for engagement.

Join a growing community of savvy Skool users who are taking their experience to the next level with Community Copilot 🙌

Community Copilot is perfect for:

🌐 Community Managers
📊 Data Analysts
📝 Content Creators
🤝 Networking Enthusiasts

Why choose Community Copilot?

🆓 Completely free to use.
🔍 In-depth analysis and insights.
🚀 Easy setup and user-friendly interface.
